short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse safely with KeyGuard Web Secure. Effortlessly filter out inappropriate content for a secure and efficient online experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Secure by KeyGuard: Streamline Your Safe Browsing

Elevate Your Browsing Experience Safely
Web Secure instantly enhances your online safety by filtering explicit adult content from your search results, ensuring a secure and family-friendly internet experience. With an easy toggle feature, you have the power to switch this protection on or off, tailoring your browsing to your needs.

Key Highlights:
1. Effective Content Filtering: Automatically blocks adult content to maintain a clean browsing space.

2. Simplicity and Efficiency: Designed for ease, offering a straightforward way to manage your online safety.

Quick and Easy Setup
Installing Web Secure is quick and effortless, providing immediate protection against inappropriate content. 
Whether for individual or family use, it's the perfect tool for enhancing internet safety.

Important Notice ! This extension changes your Default Search in Chrome browser to Yahoo. 

Embrace a safer online journey with Web Secure. Download now and take a step towards a more secure browsing experience.
